title: Fossils: clues to the past
creator_credit: Willis Briley, Sidney Platt, Thomas Craven and National Geographic Society
brief_description: Discusses what a fossil is, the ways in which fossils may be formed, what a fossil can tell us and how scientists determine their age. Shows a dig in Montana, USA, and the fossils being discovered.
creator_credit_for_label: Willis Briley, Sidney Platt, Thomas Craven and National Geographic Society
